content.title: Intro
content.content:
The 1998 Khandlendar compiled by Salman Rushtoes is a hand-made calendar made and published by Alex Lewis. Featured illustrators include artists with (somewhat unusual) pseudonyms Mustaphaa Goa Ttitt, Renee Neeneerenee, Serena Di'Consuello, Clarence Bywater-Hicks VI and Clara Brandybuck. The word "Khandlendar" is a pun on Khand, a region south of Mordor.

Dimensions: 11 5/8 x 16 3/4
White comb-bound on the top
String hanger
